name: what is the color of dreaming?
name_original: what is the color of dreaming?
description:
“What is the color of dreaming?” is a rhythm platformer where the player needs to press the keyboard keys according to the rhythm.

The player controls the magical girl #42069. Her role is to put all the houses in the city to sleep through her colored magic powder. To do so, the player needs to press Spacebar keys in the correct rhythm to perform his magic.

The game is divided into two (02) parts. During the first one the player needs to fly through the world using the Arrow keys.

In turn, during the second part, the character automatically sidewalk through the streets. To change the “kana” the player needs to press the Spacebar key, so the magic will execute when he passes over the correct house putting them to sleep. Arriving at the end of the scenario, a number of stars is assigned according to the number of houses the player into sleep.

The second part of the game is composed of two (02) phases where the player performs his magic using the correct “hiragana” (the “hiragana” is one of the syllabaries of the Japanese language).

In the first phase the player has the option of four (04) vowels (kanas) having to use them in the houses to perform the magic. However, there is only one correct “kana” for each house and the player must discover which one is the right one to perform the spell. Each house has a different color that helps the player to find the correct “kana”.

In the second phase, the player is given more “kanas” to use and make the use of magic more difficult. Likewise, each house has only one correct “kana” and it is up to the player to find out which one is correct.
